animeDescription: Rem is an ordinary woman in our world but, in the world of dreams, she becomes a dream warrior, defending humanity from the evils there. When dream demons reach the waking world, she fights them with the help of her pets which transform into a tiger and wolf.
animeRelated: ['New Dream Hunter Rem: Yume no Kishitachi']
animeVoices: ['Matsui, Naoko', 'Katsuki, Masako', 'Utsumi, Kenji', 'Tatsuta, Naoki', 'Gotou, Masumi', 'Ikeda, Shuuichi']
animeStaff: [['Okiura Hiroyuki', ['Key Animation']], ['Oobari Masami', ['Key Animation']], ['Inoue Toshiyuki', ['Key Animation']], ['Kitakubo Hiroyuki', ['Key Animation']]]
